dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: You know, it's like trying to replace every single tire on a moving car—you just can't do it all at once without causing a total standstill.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You know, it's like trying to replace every single tire on a moving car-you just can't do it all at once without causing a total standstill.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly, and that's the situation Transport Minister Marat Karabayev is facing with Kazakhstan's rail fleet. He mentioned that about 30 percent of the trains are worn out, some over 25 years old.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly, and that's the situation Transport Minister Marat Karabayev is facing with Kazakhstan's rail fleet. He mentioned that about thirty percent of the trains are worn out, some over twenty five years old.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Speaking to journalists, Karabayev noted that about 30 percent of the country's rail fleet is worn out, with some train cars in operation for over 25 years.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and they're planning to ban carriages older than 25 years, but pulling them all off the tracks immediately would cause a shortage during peak travel seasons.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and they're planning to ban carriages older than twenty five years, but pulling them all off the tracks immediately would cause a shortage during peak travel seasons.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We are working on legislation that would prohibit the use of carriages older than 25 years. He emphasized that an immediate withdrawal of all old carriages would result in a train shortage during high-demand seasons, leading to unnecessary disruption and public dissatisfaction.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, he said around 900 new carriages are being purchased to help with that transition, including 158 just this year.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, he said around nine hundred new carriages are being purchased to help with that transition, including one hundred fifty eight just this year.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Around 900 new carriages are being purchased, including 158 this year," the minister said.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And a lot of these older cars belong to private operators and KTZ, so it's not just a simple government switch—it involves coordinating with multiple stakeholders.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And a lot of these older cars belong to private operators and K T Z, so it's not just a simple government switch-it involves coordinating with multiple stakeholders.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These older cars mostly belong to private operators and Kazakhstan Temir Zholy (KTZ).

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Plus, there were those complaints about three-tiered sleeping bunks on some private trains, which Karabayev called a violation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Plus, there were those complaints about three-tiered sleeping bunks on some private trains, which Karabayev called a violation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Karabayev also addressed complaints about three-tiered sleeping bunks, which were reported in some trains operated by private companies. "This is a violation, and we've taken measures to prevent it from happening again.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Oh yeah, he said those don't meet standards and they're taking measures to make sure it doesn't happen again.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh yeah, he said those don't meet standards and they're taking measures to make sure it doesn't happen again.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: "This is a violation, and we've taken measures to prevent it from happening again. These carriages don't meet the standards and will no longer be used," he stated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting though, because while they're dealing with outdated cars, there's also work happening to equip trains with wireless internet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting though, because while they're dealing with outdated cars, there's also work happening to equip trains with wireless internet.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Earlier, the Chairman of the Telecommunications Committee under the Ministry of Digital Development, Innovation and Aerospace Industry spoke about the work to equip Kazakhstan trains with wireless Internet.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, so they're trying to modernize in some ways while managing this gradual phase-out of the older stock.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, so they're trying to modernize in some ways while managing this gradual phase-out of the older stock.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's a balancing act—you don't want public dissatisfaction from sudden shortages, but you also can't ignore safety and comfort issues forever.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's a balancing act-you don't want public dissatisfaction from sudden shortages, but you also can't ignore safety and comfort issues forever.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. I mean, 25 years is a long time for a train carriage to be in service.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. I mean, twenty five years is a long time for a train carriage to be in service.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely, and with peak demand seasons, you really can't afford to have a shortage. People rely on those trains.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely, and with peak demand seasons, you really can't afford to have a shortage. People rely on those trains.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It sounds like they're taking a pragmatic approach, even if it's not as fast as some might want.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It sounds like they're taking a pragmatic approach, even if it's not as fast as some might want.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, sometimes gradual change is the only way to avoid bigger problems down the line.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, sometimes gradual change is the only way to avoid bigger problems down the line.
